import IEllipsisData = xui.IEllipsisData;
import IEllipsisOptions = xui.IEllipsisOptions;
 
export class EllipsisController implements IEllipsisData {
 
    constructor() {
        if (!_.isObject(this.ellipsisOptions)) {
            throw new Error("Property ellipsis-options of component xui-ellipsis required.");
        }
        if (this.ellipsisOptions.tooltipText !== null && !_.isString(this.ellipsisOptions.tooltipText)) {
            throw new Error("Property ellipsis-options.tooltipText of component " +
                "xui-ellipsis required and should be a string.");
        }
    }
 
    public isEllipsisEnabled: boolean;
    public appendToBody: boolean;
    public ellipsisOptions: IEllipsisOptions;
    public findParentClass: string;
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Fri Dec 15 2017 19:51:34 GMT+0000 (UTC)
